management.name: Henry Kiritu
management.description: He is the Patron of the group. He gives the pastoral direction of the group. He is also a mandatory signature of all financial transaction. He has been very instrumental in promotion and guidance of the group

management.name: James Makena Wanyangi
management.description: He chairs all the group meetings and represents the Self-help in all stairs of governance hierarchy. He is an expert in governance and leadership with very wide experience in financial institutions especially SACCOS. He holds a Bachelor's Degree in Public Administration & Governance, a Diploma in Social Development, and a Certificate in Animal Health. He is also an accredited professional mediator and practises mediation, both court annexed and private

management.name: Kennedy Ngoro Mutugi
management.description: He holds a Diploma in Computer Management, Service & Repair and a Certificate in Electronic Science. Currently operates a service business with an electronic's workshop. In the group, he chairs Capacity Building Committee which deals with member's education and business development.

management.name: Hannah Wanjiru Ng'ang'a
management.description: She holds a Diploma in Clearing and Forwarding and has also done 10 Computer Packages. As a treasurer, she is the custodian of all group's assets both physical and financial. She also chairs the committee of Finance and Budget.

management.name: Esther Njeri Kinyuru
management.description: She holds a diploma in Early Childhood Development. Currently a full time ECD teacher. As secretary, she writes and documents all the groups deliberations and resolutions. She also chairs the committee of Risk, Audit & Compliance.

management.name: Peter Mbugua Matiru
management.description: He holds a Bachelor's Degree in Philosophy and a Certificate in Teaching. He is the Secretary to Budget & Finance Committee as well as a member to Risk, Audit & Compliance Committee.

management.name: Samuel Ngure Mburu
management.description: He is a seasonal artisan in Building and Construction. He is a member of Capacity Building Committee and Finance & Budget

management.name: John Maingi Kimani
management.description: He operates a tailoring business and has attended several marketing seminars and workshops. He is a member of Committee on Capacity Building and Risk, Audit & Compliance.

management.name: Samuel Kamau Kanini
management.description: He is a CPA-K Profession. He oversees the operations of the group including Finances, Promotion, and Customer Service. He is also the
